name: Come Again Another Day
description:
Watch out for nastly precipitation that falls from the skys! You only have 5 ties, and if they allget wet...

This was made with unity with a course from Blackthornprod. I did all the art and sound effects myself. I did all the programing nad editior stuff too, but I did use the videos in the course often. I added a few things myself, like the score counter, the trail renderers, etc.

I also used Bosca Ceoil for the music and sound effects, and procreate for the art.
